titles.title: Census of Agriculture Act of 1997
Census of Agriculture Act of 1997
Census of Agriculture Act of 1997
Census of Agriculture Act of 1997
To transfer to the Secretary of Agriculture the authority to conduct the census of agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Government Reform and Oversight
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Security, International Affairs and Criminal Justice.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.
Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Agriculture. H. Rept. 105-296, Part I.
Mr. Goodlatte moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Thompson without amendment. With written report No. 105-141.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 276.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Government Reform and Oversight

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/31/1997--Introduced. Census of Agriculture Act of 1997 - Amends Federal law to transfer authority to conduct the census of agriculture from the Secretary of Commerce to the Secretary (Secretary) of Agriculture. Requires the Secretary to take a census every five years beginning in 1998. Sets forth enforcement and confidentiality provisions.
